headline:
It's #WorldPneumoniaDay
 
#Pneum onia causes more than 1 in 10 deaths of children below 5 years of age, killing over 740000 per year.

#DYK? It is the single largest infectious cause of death in children worldwide? 🌎🌍🌏
 
👉https://t.co/jNgiyWcpsK https://t.co/MGFSHnYbqZ
tweets:
Almost 1/3 of pneumonia deaths are attributable to air pollution.

On #WorldPneumoniaDay, we ask governments to make concrete and measurable commitments at #COP27 to end #AirPollution. https://t.co/D0W3dmLwoQ

Pneumonia kills more than 700,000 children every year, accounting for nearly 15% of all deaths of children under 5.

On Saturday's #WorldPneumoniaDay, see how @WHO is working to protect, prevent & treat pneumonia in children. https://t.co/3rPsuH1B24 https://t.co/JMBbbiaoDo

It's #WorldPneumoniaDay
 
#Pneumonia causes more than 1 in 10 deaths of children below 5 years of age, killing over 740000 per year.

#DYK? It is the single largest infectious cause of death in children worldwide? 🌎🌍🌏
 
👉https://t.co/jNgiyWcpsK https://t.co/MGFSHnYbqZ

It's #WorldPneumoniaDay
 
#Pneumonia causes more than 1 in 10 deaths of children below 5 years of age, killing over 740000 per year.

#DYK? It is the single largest infectious cause of death in children worldwide? 🌎🌍🌏
 
👉https://t.co/jNgiyWcpsK https://t.co/MGFSHnYbqZ

This World Pneumonia Day, 12 NOV 2022, @FIRS is calling on governments & other stakeholders to take urgent action to tackle pneumonia - focusing on those who are at greatest risk of severe illness. Read more: https://t.co/U0Ct7oSxIY #WorldPneumoniaDay #EveryBreathCounts #GINA https://t.co/UcFKtqjMbN
